values: 麻烦；（机器、车辆等的）故障；问题；困难；困境；苦恼；忧虑；纷争；动乱时期；额外努力；额外工作
使烦恼；使忧虑；使苦恼；造成困扰；引起麻烦；使感到不便；使疼痛；打扰；麻烦；费心；费力；费事；费神；劳驾

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 麻烦的；讨厌的；使人苦恼的
动乱的，不安的；混乱的；困惑的
捣乱者，闹事者；惹麻烦的人
故障检修工；解决纠纷者；解决麻烦问题的能手

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重指因不断的干扰而引起的烦恼，有时含激怒的意味。
指给人在行动上带来不便或在身心上造成痛苦。
强调因被迫忍受令人不快、讨厌的事而失去平静或耐心，多指一时的打拢或恼怒。
较正式用词，多用被动态。指拢乱，使人不能平静或妨碍别人工作、思维或正常秩序，是程度较深的烦恼。
指使人烦恼而引起的紧张不安或感到不耐烦。
语气比annoy强得多，指激怒，使发怒，多指一种短时间的反应。

word_group.brief_definition: 有麻烦；有困难；遇到麻烦
惹上麻烦；遇到麻烦；碰到麻烦
自找麻烦, 自寻烦恼, 惹是生非
苦恼让人知晓, 负担一半减少
word_group.phrase: a trouble shared is a trouble halved

word_group.brief_definition: 有困难；有麻烦；遇到麻烦

bilingual.source: Mr Mattar was in big trouble again.
bilingual.target: 马塔尔先生又遇到了大麻烦。

bilingual.source: Running in corridors will get you into trouble.
bilingual.target: 在走廊里跑会让你惹上麻烦。

bilingual.source: Sometimes I get into trouble for speaking my mind.
bilingual.target: 有时我因为直言不讳而惹麻烦。

bilingual.source: Let's go back home or we'll get into trouble.
bilingual.target: 让我们回家吧，否则我们会遇到麻烦。

bilingual.source: Animals kept at home can cause trouble for neighbours.
bilingual.target: 在家养的动物可能会给邻居带来麻烦。

bilingual.source: People used to send out sky lanterns when they were in trouble.
bilingual.target: 人们过去在遇到麻烦时会放天灯。

list.abstract: 《trouble》是Akon (阿肯)、Sweet Rush演唱的英语R&B歌曲，发行于2008年11月25日，收录于专辑《Freedom》中。 《trouble》在选曲方面多偏向于能够激起人心的歌曲，将有技巧性的夹带着一些充满感情的hip-hop。
don't panic是coldplay在2000年7月10日发行的专辑《Parachutes》中收录的一首歌曲。

yingyinNormal.en: We could get in big trouble.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想，我们可能会有大麻烦。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll save you the trouble. I quit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不用麻烦你了，我辞职。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks for getting me in trouble.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是多谢你，我麻烦大了。

yingyinNormal.en: This guy giving you trouble, sis? Sis?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他找你麻烦，姐? 姐?

yingyinNormal.en: Really, you don't have to go to any trouble.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的不用麻烦了。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm gonna keep your young'un out of trouble, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会让您的乖女儿远离麻烦的，老师。

yingyinNormal.en: I was just passing through. I don't want any trouble.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是路过而已，不想惹什么麻烦。

yingyinNormal.en: This Jordan Valley thing's a mess. He's in big trouble.
yingyinNormal.zh: 约旦河谷真是一团糟。他有大麻烦了。

yingyinNormal.en: Simba, being brave doesn't mean you go looking for trouble.
yingyinNormal.zh: 辛巴，成为真正的勇者吧，勇敢并不表示你要去找麻烦。

yingyinNormal.en: We're losing Giambi, Damon, Isringhausen. Done deal. We're in trouble.
yingyinNormal.zh: 吉昂比、戴蒙、伊斯林豪森都要走了，已成定局，我们有麻烦了。

yingyinNormal.en: Trouble, Miss Romanoff, no matter who wins or loses, trouble still comes 'round.
yingyinNormal.zh: 麻烦可以，罗曼诺夫小姐，不论谁胜谁负，麻烦总是接踵而来。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, he just doesn't want us to go through any trouble.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他只是怕麻烦我们而已。

yingyinNormal.en: Now I always believed a friend helps another friend out of trouble, not into it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一直深信一个朋友会帮助另一个朋友摆脱麻烦，而不是卷入麻烦。

yingyinNormal.en: I was looking for my brothers. They are always getting in trouble.
yingyinNormal.zh: 找我弟弟，他们老是惹麻烦。

yingyinNormal.en: So, the heart you got from the wizard giving you trouble?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你那巫师得来的心脏让你陷入麻烦了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: My God, Aidan. I know you're in trouble. Here's the plan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天呐，艾丹。我知道你有麻烦了。我们这么办。

yingyinNormal.en: Got himself into serious trouble with the Americans a couple of years ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 几年前跟美国人惹上了大麻烦。

yingyinNormal.en: It would've been less trouble. And I might have had more fun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样麻烦不但少了，我还可能得到更多乐趣。

yingyinNormal.en: What are they doing to him? He's in trouble! Then you must go to him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们对他做了什么？他有麻烦了！那你快去吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Belle! I heard you had trouble with the headmaster. He never liked me either.
yingyinNormal.zh: 贝儿！我听说校长找你麻烦了。他从来都不喜欢我 。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 困难; 麻烦; 困境

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 惹是生非者；捣乱者
adj. 被扰乱的；混乱的；苦恼的；忧虑的
adj. 棘手的；令人烦恼的

word_family.mean: n. 困难；难题；动荡；骚乱；麻烦；机器故障；身体不适；工夫；力气；引起担心、不便的原因

sense_info_list.en: a source of difficulty; a situation that is difficult or dangerous; a situation in which you can be criticized or punished
sense_info_list.zh: 困难; 麻烦; 困境

examination_example.sentence: They have <highlight>troubles</highlight> seeing a financial future and they are quite risk averse.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们很难看到金融的未来，而且他们非常规避风险。

examination_example.sentence: Previous studies on CSR have had <highlight>trouble</highlight> differentiating these effects because consumers can be affected by all three.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以前关于企业社会责任的研究难以区分这些影响，因为消费者可能会受到这三者的影响。

examination_example.sentence: An old saying has it that half of all advertising budgets are wasted—the <highlight>trouble</highlight> is, no one knows which half.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一句老话说，所有广告预算的一半都被浪费了——问题是，没有人知道是哪一半。

sense_info_list.en: the malfunction of something such as a machine or a part of the body
effort or exertion made to do something, especially when inconvenient
a cause of worry or inconvenience
public unrest or disorder

the time of political and social problems in Northern Ireland, especially after 1968, when there was violence between Catholics and Protestants about whether Northern Ireland should remain part of the UK

word_usage.usage:
trouble作“麻烦；困难”解时，是不可数名词；表示“引起麻烦的事”时，是单数名词。例：
Your trouble is that you can't take rejection.
你的问题是不能接受拒绝。

trouble作“烦恼；忧虑”解时，为复数名词。例：
She tells me her troubles.
她告诉我她的烦恼。

trouble作动词指“劳驾；麻烦；费神；费力”时，是及物动词时，后接名词、代词或动词不定式作宾语，还可接以动词不定式充当补足语的复合宾语。例：
You needn't trouble to come over.
你不必来了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (造成)困境; 难题; 险境
苦恼的原因; 使烦恼的人/事
机器故障; 身体不舒服

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 棘手的；令人烦恼的

word_family.mean: n. 困难；难题；动荡；骚乱；麻烦；机器故障；身体不适；工夫；力气；引起担心、不便的原因

sense_info_list.en: a source of difficulty; a situation that is difficult or dangerous; a situation in which you can be criticized or punished
sense_info_list.zh: (造成)困境; 难题; 险境

examination_example.sentence: They create lots of <highlight>trouble</highlight> for GMO food producers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们给转基因食品生产商制造了很多麻烦。

examination_example.sentence: It's clear that Macy's believes its <highlight>troubles</highlight> run deeper than a temporary aberration (偏离) off the thermometer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很显然梅西百货认为其麻烦要比温度计短暂的偏离更棘手。

sense_info_list.en: a cause of worry or inconvenience; a particular aspect or quality of something regarded as unsatisfactory or as a source of difficulty
sense_info_list.zh: 苦恼的原因; 使烦恼的人/事

sense_info_list.en: the malfunction of something such as a machine or a part of the body
sense_info_list.zh: 机器故障; 身体不舒服

sense_info_list.en: effort or exertion made to do something, especially when inconvenient
public unrest or disorder

word_usage.usage:
trouble表“麻烦, 困难”，为不可数名词；作“引起麻烦的人/事”解时，为可数名词；而作“苦恼, 忧虑”解时，为复数名词（troubles）。
示例：很抱歉给你带来了这么多不便。
误 It is a pity to give you so many troubles.
正 It is a pity to give you so much trouble.

“做...有困难”用have trouble (in) doing sth.，注意不用动词不定式。
示例：I have trouble parking.
我停车有困难。

“某人有麻烦"用sb. be in trouble。
示例：假如你付不了账的话，你就会有麻烦。
If you can't pay the bill, you're going to be in trouble.

“使某人烦恼”用trouble sb.表达，中间不需加介词。
示例：What is it that's troubling you?
是什么事使得你愁眉苦脸？

“麻烦某人做某事”用trouble sb. to do sth.表达。
示例：Could I trouble you to open the window, please?
劳驾，请您把窗户打开好吗？

exam_freq_info.chinese: (造成)困境; 可能受到批评的情形
苦恼的原因; 使烦恼的人/事
机器故障; 身体不舒服

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 棘手的；令人烦恼的

word_family.mean: n. 困难；难题；动荡；骚乱；麻烦；机器故障；身体不适；工夫；力气；引起担心、不便的原因

sense_info_list.en: a source of difficulty; a situation that is difficult or dangerous; a situation in which you can be criticized or punished
sense_info_list.zh: (造成)困境; 可能受到批评的情形

examination_example.sentence: Painting a house involves more <highlight>trouble</highlight> than she thought.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 粉刷房子比她想象的要麻烦得多。

examination_example.sentence: After age 50, it's quite common to have <highlight>trouble</highlight> remembering the names of people, places and things quickly, says Dr. Kirk Daffner of Brigham and Women's Hospital in Boston.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 波士顿布莱根妇女医院的柯克·达夫纳(Kirk Daffner)博士说，在50岁以后，通常很难快速记住人物，地点和事物的名称。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>trouble</highlight> with those things is that within six months to a year, people are back to their original baseline levels of well-being.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 问题是，在6个月到1年的时间里，人们又回到了最初的幸福基线水平。

sense_info_list.en: a cause of worry or inconvenience; a particular aspect or quality of something regarded as unsatisfactory or as a source of difficulty
sense_info_list.zh: 苦恼的原因; 使烦恼的人/事

sense_info_list.en: effort or exertion made to do something; especially when inconvenient
the malfunction of something such as a machine or a part of the body
sense_info_list.zh: 机器故障; 身体不舒服

sense_info_list.en: public unrest or disorder

word_usage.usage:
“麻烦某人做某事”用trouble sb. to do sth.表达。
示例：Could I trouble you to open the window, please?
劳驾，请您把窗户打开好吗？

“某人有麻烦"用sb. be in trouble。
示例：假如你付不了账的话，你就会有麻烦。
If you can't pay the bill, you're going to be in trouble.

“使某人烦恼”用trouble sb.表达，中间不需加介词。
示例：What is it that's troubling you?
是什么事使得你愁眉苦脸？

“做...有困难”用have trouble (in) doing sth.，注意不用动词不定式。
示例：I have trouble parking.
我停车有困难。

trouble表“麻烦, 困难”，为不可数名词；作“引起麻烦的人/事”解时，为可数名词；而作“苦恼, 忧虑”解时，为复数名词（troubles）。
示例：很抱歉给你带来了这么多不便。
误 It is a pity to give you so many troubles.
正 It is a pity to give you so much trouble.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 棘手的；令人烦恼的
adj. 被扰乱的；混乱的；苦恼的；忧虑的

word_family.mean: n. 困难；难题；动荡；骚乱；麻烦；机器故障；身体不适；工夫；力气；引起担心、不便的原因

sense_info_list.en: a source of difficulty; a situation that is difficult or dangerous; a situation in which you can be criticized or punished

examination_example.sentence: One of the questions is: Who will you go to in times of <highlight>trouble</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中一个问题：遇到麻烦你会去找谁？

examination_example.sentence: Lehanne's psychology café is about more than knowing oneself: It's trying to help the city's <highlight>troubled</highlight> neighborhood cafes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莱汉的心理咖啡不仅仅是为了了解自己：它是在试图帮助该市陷入困境的社区咖啡馆。

examination_example.sentence: My trip to the repair shop cost me $62, and the set is working well now, but I keep expecting more <highlight>trouble</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我去修理店花了62美元，这台电视机现在运转良好，但我总觉得会有更多麻烦。

sense_info_list.en: the malfunction of something such as a machine or a part of the body
sense_info_list.zh: 机器故障; 身体不舒服

examination_example.sentence: Getting a little closer, I realized one kayak (皮筏艇) was in <highlight>trouble</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 走近一点，我意识到有一条皮划艇遇到了麻烦。

sense_info_list.en: a cause of worry or inconvenience; a particular aspect or quality of something regarded as unsatisfactory or as a source of difficulty

examination_example.sentence: It's good to know there's still someone out there who cares enough to go to that kind of <highlight>trouble</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很高兴知道仍然有人愿意操心，去解决那种麻烦。

sense_info_list.en: effort or exertion made to do something, especially when inconvenient

examination_example.sentence: Back home, Ehlers was <highlight>troubled</highlight> by that lost dog.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 回到家里，埃勒斯为那条丢失的狗而烦恼。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 问题; 困难; 处于麻烦境地; 使忧虑
烦扰; 麻烦; 费神

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 被扰乱的；混乱的；苦恼的；忧虑的

word_family.mean: n. 困难；难题；动荡；骚乱；麻烦；机器故障；身体不适；工夫；力气；引起担心、不便的原因

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 有麻烦；有困难；遇到麻烦
惹上麻烦；遇到麻烦；碰到麻烦

sense_info_list.en: a source of difficulty; a situation that is difficult or dangerous; a situation in which you can be criticized or punished
sense_info_list.zh: 问题; 困难; 处于麻烦境地; 使忧虑

examination_example.sentence: The grammar <highlight>troubled</highlight> me a lot and even drove me crazy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 语法让我把我弄得很烦，甚至让我发疯。

examination_example.sentence: Snakes are also very clean and quiet and they seldom <highlight>trouble</highlight> humans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蛇也非常干净和安静，它们很少打扰人类。

examination_example.sentence: If you never give up when in <highlight>trouble</highlight>, you should be proud of yourself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你遇到困难时从不放弃，你应该为自己感到自豪。

sense_info_list.en: the malfunction of something such as a machine or a part of the body

examination_example.sentence: Treat people with skin <highlight>trouble</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 治疗有皮肤问题的人。

examination_example.sentence: What's the <highlight>trouble</highlight> / the matter / wrong?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有什么问题？

sense_info_list.en: effort or exertion made to do something, especially when inconvenient
sense_info_list.zh: 烦扰; 麻烦; 费神

examination_example.sentence: Thomas said, "It isn't worth the <highlight>trouble</highlight>."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 托马斯说：“这不值得麻烦。”

examination_example.sentence: It's easy to buy our food from the local supermarket, so why do we go to the <highlight>trouble</highlight> of growing our own?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从当地超市购买我们的食物很容易，那么我们为什么要费劲自己种植呢？

word_usage.usage:
trouble表“麻烦, 困难”，为不可数名词；作“引起麻烦的人/事”解时，为可数名词；而作“苦恼, 忧虑”解时，为复数名词（troubles）。
示例：很抱歉给你带来了这么多不便。
误 It is a pity to give you so many troubles.
正 It is a pity to give you so much trouble.

“做...有困难”用have trouble (in) doing sth.，注意不用动词不定式。
示例：I have trouble parking.
我停车有困难。

“某人有麻烦"用sb. be in trouble。
示例：假如你付不了账的话，你就会有麻烦。
If you can't pay the bill, you're going to be in trouble.

“使某人烦恼”用trouble sb.表达，中间不需加介词。
示例：What is it that's troubling you?
是什么事使得你愁眉苦脸？

“麻烦某人做某事”用trouble sb. to do sth.表达。
示例：Could I trouble you to open the window, please?
劳驾，请您把窗户打开好吗？
